actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce.

official_title: A joint resolution to urge the Washington Metropolitan Airport Authority to use its existing authority to change the name of the Washington Dulles International Airport to Eisenhower International Airport.

summary.text: Urges the Washington Metropolitan Airport Authority to change the name of Washington Dulles International Airport to Eisenhower International Airport while retaining the name of the main terminal, the Dulles Terminal.

titles.title: A joint resolution to urge the Washington Metropolitan Airport Authority to use its existing authority to change the name of the Washington Dulles International Airport to Eisenhower International Airport.
